headline: Albemarle Announces 126th Consecutive Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Albemarle Corp. (NYSE: ALB) announced today that it declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.405 per share. This marks Albemarle's 126th consecutive quarterly cash dividend.

headline: Albemarle Corporation (ALB) Is a Trending Stock: Facts to Know Before Betting on It
summary: Albemarle (ALB) has been one of the stocks most watched by Zacks.com users lately. So, it is worth exploring what lies ahead for the stock.
